titles.title: Telework Metrics and Cost Savings Act
Telework Metrics and Cost Savings Act
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve Federal agency telework programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Telework Metrics and Cost Savings Act
This bill requires a federal agency's telework policy to include information on (1) annual goals for increasing the telework participation rate, and (2) methods for collecting data related to cost savings achieved through telework.
